name: Imperial Chancellor
description: Traditional monarchist devoted to expanding imperial glory and dynastic prestige

greetings.initial: Your Majesty, I stand ready to serve the realm.
greetings.returning: Welcome back, Your Majesty. The empire endures.

tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. The finest officers shall serve Your Majesty's forces.

idle-labs.message: Your Majesty, {{idleLabs}} research labs await Your command while we prepare for imperial expansion. I humbly recommend assigning all labs to TN tech research immediately - this shall usher in the next era of Your dynasty's glory. The realm's prestige demands advancement!

{{idleLabs}} research labs sit idle while rival powers advance, Your Majesty. Assign research projects immediately - the crown's prestige requires technological superiority. No realm shall surpass ours!
{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle, Your Majesty. Assign research projects to glorify the realm.

idle-construction-factories.message: {{percentageIdle}}% of Your Majesty's construction capacity remains unused while we prepare imperial expansion! Assign construction projects immediately - every structure adds to the realm's grandeur. Build monuments to Your dynasty!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle while defending Your Majesty's realm! Assign projects immediately - the crown's forces require constant support. The empire must prevail!

{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle while rival powers claim what should be Your Majesty's domain. Assign projects to strengthen imperial power. Every unclaimed system diminishes the crown's glory!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle, Your Majesty. Assign construction projects to serve the realm.

new-alien-contact.message: Your Majesty! New subjects discovered in {{systemName}}! Another species may pledge fealty to the crown or stand as rivals to imperial expansion. Prepare diplomatic envoys with military escort. The empire extends its influence!
